name: Missileman Spy Strike 2
description:
-Created in 2012 before the series was completely redone-

Jump into over 20 levels of excitement as Missileman or Jessie as they set off to defeat a mysterious villain with an overly sinister plan to mess with the universe! Missileman can advance forward by shooting down any enemies that try to stop him. He could also sneak his way past agents that are tracking him down. Jessie could punch enemies and perform a mid-air kick. These two will stop at nothing to restore peace to the beloved city of Cred Street before daylight arrives!

Note: Works better on Windows 7 and under
